title: What to Expect from Big Tech Earnings Next Week
text: What to Watch For From Big Tech Companies

title: Apple iPhone shipments declined almost 15% year-over-year in 2022
text: Yahoo Finance tech editor Dan Howley details how smartphone shipments are at their lowest level since 2013, with Apple iPhone shipments down nearly 15% YOY.

title: Big Banks Try to Take On Apple Wallet and PayPal
text: Plus, we chat about the layoffs at Spotify and what's going on at Funko.

title: China's reopening isn't going to be a tailwind for Apple, says BofA's Wamsi Mohan
text: Wamsi Mohan, Bank of America analyst, joins 'Closing Bell' to discuss Apple ahead of its earnings report next week.

title: Will This Week's Big Tech Earnings Be a Train Wreck?
text: Broadly speaking, the market's favorable reaction to the Microsoft results is in the same spirit with which it has received all incoming results in the Q4 earnings season.
